# Pull Request Template

## Backend Integration Setup Instructions

### Supabase API Details:
- **Project URL**: [https://qxiejawacjmldeslvwue.supabase.co](https://qxiejawacjmldeslvwue.supabase.co)
- **Publishable API Key**: `sb_publishable_LpUKny55t7K9yZMirYse8g_2T3--I50`

### Integration Notes for Jikan API:
The following endpoints do not require an API key:
- **Search for Anime**: `GET https://api.jikan.moe/v4/anime?q=<nom>`  
- **Search for Characters**: `GET https://api.jikan.moe/v4/characters?q=<nom>`  
- **Get Full Anime Information**: `GET https://api.jikan.moe/v4/anime/<id>/full`

## Additional Notes
- Ensure to handle errors properly during integration.  
- Refer to the respective API documentation for more details and updates.
